title: Machine Learning for Beginners
welcomeContent: Ready to start your exciting journey into Machine Learning? Don't worry, we'll take it step by step!
completed: You've completed {{currentModule}} out of {{totalModules}} lessons. Keep going!

modules.title: What is Machine Learning?
modules.content: Machine Learning is teaching computers to learn from data, just like how you learn from experience!

modules.title: Your First ML Concept: Classification
modules.content: Classification is like sorting your toys into different boxes based on their features.

modules.title: Fun with Numbers: Prediction
modules.content: Prediction is guessing a number based on other numbers, like guessing how many candies are in a jar.

modules.title: Exploring Data: Visualization
modules.content: Data visualization is like drawing pictures to understand your data better. It helps us see patterns!

modules.title: Learning from Mistakes: Model Evaluation
modules.content: Evaluating your model is like checking your homework. It helps us know how well our machine is learning!

modules.title: Making Decisions: Decision Trees
modules.content: A decision tree is like a game of 20 questions, where each answer leads to a new question or a final decision.

modules.title: Finding Patterns: Clustering
modules.content: Clustering is grouping similar things together, like organizing your closet by types of clothes.

modules.title: Learning from Experience: Reinforcement Learning
modules.content: Reinforcement learning is like training a pet. The computer learns by getting rewards for good actions!
